allow: Bash(git filter-branch --force --index-filter "git rm -rf --cached --ignore-unmatch backend/todo_app.db frontend/node_modules frontend/.next" --prune-empty --tag-name-filter cat -- --all)

Bash(git commit -m "Add large file patterns to .gitignore

- Add node_modules/, .next/, *.db patterns to prevent tracking large files
- Add frontend build artifacts to ignore list
- Add database files to ignore list")

Bash(python -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect\(''backend/todo_app.db''\)
cursor = conn.cursor\(\)
cursor.execute\(''SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=''''table'''';''\)
tables = cursor.fetchall\(\)
print\(''Tables in database:'', tables\)
conn.close\(\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect\(''backend/todo_app.db''\)
cursor = conn.cursor\(\)
cursor.execute\(""SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=''table'';""\)
tables = cursor.fetchall\(\)
print\(''Tables in database:'', tables\)
conn.close\(\)
")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix Vercel deployment: Remove conflicting Pages Router API route

- Removed conflicting frontend/pages/api/index.ts that was causing route conflict with App Router
- Added .claude directory to .gitignore to prevent committing personal configuration
- Resolves build error: ''Conflicting app and page file was found''")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix Vercel deployment: Update configuration files

- Remove deprecated ''appDir'' option from next.config.js experimental section
- Simplify vercel.json by removing manual builds configuration that was overriding default Next.js detection
- Fixes ''Invalid next.config.js options detected'' error
- Fixes ''Build and Development Settings'' warning")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix API URL for Vercel deployment

- Change NEXT_PUBLIC_BACKEND_API_URL default from ''http://localhost:3000'' to ''/api''
- This allows frontend to use Next.js API routes instead of trying to connect to non-existent localhost backend on Vercel
- Fixes 404 errors by directing API calls to Next.js API routes deployed on Vercel")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix Vercel configuration: Set root directory and framework

- Add rootDirectory: ''frontend'' to vercel.json to specify where Next.js app is located
- Add framework: ''nextjs'' to explicitly tell Vercel this is a Next.js project
- Fixes ''No Next.js version detected'' error by pointing Vercel to the correct directory")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix Vercel configuration: Remove invalid rootDirectory property

- Remove invalid ''rootDirectory'' property from vercel.json
- Vercel project settings need to be configured in the Vercel dashboard for monorepo setups
- Keep vercel.json minimal to avoid configuration errors")

Bash(git commit -m "Remove unnecessary backend dependencies from frontend

- Remove bcrypt and jsonwebtoken dependencies that are not needed in frontend
- These backend libraries could be causing build issues in Vercel environment
- Keep only essential frontend dependencies")

Bash(git commit -m "Move build dependencies to production dependencies

- Move autoprefixer, postcss, and tailwindcss to dependencies
- These are needed for the build process in Vercel environment
- Fixes ''Cannot find module tailwindcss'' build error")
